      • landOnField

        public void landOnField(GameBoard game,
                        int boardValue,
                        int playersTurn,
                        MUI mui,
                        Shaker shake)
        This instance of landOnField, works by first, checking if the Field we are currently on, is owned by anyone. If it isnt, then it starts the buyPropperty method. If it is, it makes the player just automaticly pay the rent. It doesnt check who the owner is, because if the owner is yourself, value on your balance wont change.
        Parameters:
        game - Instance of game.
        boardValue - Instance of the boardvalue as integer
        playersTurn - Instance of the currentPlayer as integer
        mui - instance of MUI
        shake - instance of Shake
